content.text:
# List of honours of Kedah awarded to heads of state and royalty

This article serves as an index – as complete as possible – of all the honorific orders or similar decorations awarded by Kedah, classified by Monarchies chapter and Republics chapter, and, under each chapter, recipients' countries and the detailed list of recipients.
Awards
Monarchies
Kedah Royal Family
* Al-Aminul Karim Sultan Sallehuddin, Sultan of Kedah :
**  Grand Master of the State of Kedah Star of Valour (since 12 September 2017)
**  Grand Master (since 12 September 2017) and Member (DK, 15 January 2017) of the Royal Family Order of Kedah
**  Grand Master and Member of the Halimi Family Order of Kedah (DKH, since 12 September 2017)
**  Founding Grand Master and Member of the Sallehuddin Family Order of Kedah (DKS, since 19 June 2022)
**  Grand Master (since 12 September 2017) and Member of the Kedah Supreme Order of Merit (DUK, 2018)
**  Grand Master and Member of the Supreme Order of Sri Mahawangsa (DMK, since 12 September 2017)
**  Grand Master of the State of Kedah Star of Gallantry (since 12 September 2017)
**  Founding Grand Master and Grand Commander of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan Sallehuddin of Kedah (SSSK, since 30 April 2018) with title ''Dato' Seri Diraja''
**  Grand Master (since 12 September 2017) and Grand Commander (SHMS, 16 July 2008) of the Order of Sultan 'Abdu'l Halim Mu'azzam Shah with title ''Dato' Seri Diraja
**  Grand Master and Knight Grand Commander of the Glorious Order of the Crown of Kedah (SGMK, since 12 September 2017)
**  Founding Grand Master (since 1 November 2021) and Knight Grand Commander of the Glorious Order of the Loyal Warrior of Kedah (SSPK, 30 June 2024) with title Dato' Seri Pahlawan
**  Grand Master and Knight Grand Commander of the Exalted Order of the Crown of Kedah (SPMK, since 12 September 2017)
** Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah :
***  Grand Master (since 12 September 2017) and Knight Grand Companion (SSDK, 1987) with title Dato' Seri
***  Knight Companion (DSDK, 1982) with title Dato'
**  State of Kedah Distinguished Service Star (BCK, 1970)
**  Silver Jubilee Medal (15 July 1983)
**  Golden Jubilee Medal (15 July 2008)
* Sultanah Maliha, Sultanah of Kedah :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 21 January 2018)
**  Grand Commander of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan Sallehuddin of Kedah (SSSK, 30 April 2018) with title Dato' Seri Diraja''
**  Grand Commander of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan Abdul Halim Mu'adzam Shah (SHMS, 15 January 2017) with title ''Dato' Seri Diraja
** Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah :
***  Knight Grand Companion (SSDK, 12 December 2011) with title Dato' Seri
***  Knight Companion (DSDK, 2001) with title Dato'
**  Silver Jubilee Medal (15 July 1983)
**  Golden Jubilee Medal (15 July 2008)
* Tengku Sarafudin Badlishah, Raja Muda of Kedah :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 19 June 2022)
**  Member of the Supreme Order of Sri Mahawangsa (DMK, 26 November 2017)
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (DSDK, 21 January 2007) with title Dato'
**  Companion of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan Sallehuddin of Kedah (SSS)
**  Golden Jubilee Medal (15 July 2008)
* Che Puan Muda Zaheeda, Raja Puan Muda of Kedah :
**  Member of the Sallehuddin Family Order of Kedah (DKS, 19 June 2022)
**  Knight Grand Commander of the Exalted Order of the Crown of Kedah (SPMK, 12 September 2018) with title Dato' Seri
* Tunku Shazuddin Ariff, Tunku Mahkota of Kedah :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan Sallehuddin of Kedah (SSSK, 25 August 2019) with title Dato' Seri Diraja
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (DSDK, 19 January 2014) with title Dato'''
**  Companion of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan Abdul Halim Mu'adzam Shah (SMS, 2009)
* Che Puan Nur Julie Ariff, Tunku Puan Mahkota of Kedah :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan Sallehuddin of Kedah (SSSK, 18 June 2023) with title ''Dato' Seri Diraja
* Che Puan Besar Haminah, Che Puan Besar of Kedah (2nd wife of the late'' Sultan Abdul Halim) :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 9 January 2004)
**  Member of the Halimi Family Order of Kedah (DKH, 16 July 2008)
**  Member of the Supreme Order of Sri Mahawangsa (DMK, 20 January 2017)
* Tunku Intan Safinaz, Tunku Temenggong of Kedah (Sultan Abdul Halim of Kedah and Tuanku Bahiyah's daughter) :
**  Member of the Halimi Family Order of Kedah (DKH, 16 July 2008)
**  Grand Commander of the Order of Sultan 'Abdu'l Halim Mu'azzam Shah (SHMS, 12 December 2011) with title ''Dato' Seri Diraja
**  Knight Grand Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (SSDK, 28 November 1988) with title Dato' Seri''
** Justice of the Peace of Kedah (JP, 19 January 2004)
* Tunku Soraya, Sultan Abdul Halim and Tuanku Bahiyah's adoptive daughter :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of Sultan 'Abdu'l Halim Mu'azzam Shah (SHMS, 16 July 2008) with title ''Dato' Seri Diraja
**  Knight Grand Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (SSDK, 28 November 1987) with title Dato' Seri''
* Tunku Abdul Hamid Thani, Tunku Bendahara of Kedah (youngest son of Sultan Badlishah) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of Sultan 'Abdu'l Halim Mu'azzam Shah (SHMS, 16 July 2008) with title ''Dato' Seri
** Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah :
***  Knight Grand Companion (SSDK, 19 January 2004) with title Dato' Seri
***  Knight Companion (DSDK, 28 November 1991) with title Dato'''
* Toh Puan Nora Abdullah, Toh Puan Bendahara of Kedah (Tunku Abdul Hamid Thani's wife) :
** Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah :
***  Knight Companion (DSDK, 12 December 2011) with title Dato'
***  Companion (SDK, 2010)
* Tunku Sakinah, second daughter of Sultan Badlishah :
**  Knight Grand Commander of the Exalted Order of the Crown of Kedah (SPMK, 15 January 2017) with title ''Dato' Seri
* Tunku Hosnah, third daughter of Sultan Badlishah :
** Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah :
***  Knight Grand Companion (SSDK, 12 December 2011) with title Dato' Seri
***  Knight Companion (DSDK, 28 November 1987) with title Dato'
* Tunku Bisharah, fourth daughter of Sultan Badlishah :
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (DSDK, 20 January 2008) with title Dato'''
**  Companion of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan 'Abdu'l Halim Mu'azzam Shah (SMS, 1998)
* Tunku Badriatul Jamal, fifth daughter of Sultan Badlishah :
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (DSDK, 20 January 2008) with title Dato'
* Tunku Kamaliah, sixth daughter of Sultan Badlishah :
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (DSDK, 21 January 2007) with title Dato'
* Tunku Nafisah, youngest daughter of Sultan Badlishah :
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (DSDK,21 January 2007) with title Dato'
**  Companion of the Order of Loyalty to Sultan 'Abdu'l Halim Mu'azzam Shah (SMS, 21 January 2002)
; STATES of MALAYSIA :
Johor Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Ibrahim, Sultan of Johor :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 25 February 2018)
Kelantan Royal Family
* Sultan Muhammad V, Sultan of Kelantan :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 26 March 2012)
* Tengku Muhammad Faiz Petra, Sultan Muhammad V's younger brother :
**  Member of the Supreme Order of Sri Mahawangsa (DMK, 30 September 2017) with title ''Dato' Seri Utama''
Negeri Sembilan Royal Family
* Tuanku Muhriz, Yang di-Pertuan Besar of Negeri Sembilan :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 13 May 2010)
Pahang Royal Family
* Al-Sultan Abdullah Ri'ayatuddin Al-Mustafa Billah Shah, Sultan of Pahang :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 5 September 2019)
Perak Royal Family
* Sultan Nazrin Muizzuddin Shah, Sultan of Perak :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK)
* Raja Iskandar Dzurkarnain, Raja Di-Hilir of Perak (Tunku Soraya's husband) :
**  Knight Grand Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal House of Kedah (SSDK, 21 January 2000) with title ''Dato' Seri
Perlis Royal Family
* Tuanku Syed Sirajuddin, Raja of Perlis :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 21 January 2002)
Selangor Royal Family
* Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah Alhaj, Sultan of Selangor :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 20 January 2003)
Terengganu Royal Family
* Al-Wathiqu Billah Sultan Mizan Zainal Abidin, Sultan of Terengganu :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK, 21 January 2002)
* Sultanah Nur Zahirah, Sultanah of Terengganu :
**  Member of the Royal Family Order of Kedah (DK)
Governors of Penang
* Abdul Rahman Abbas 7th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Penang (1 May 2001 – 30 April 2021) :
**  Member of the Supreme Order of Sri Mahawangsa (DMK, 21 January 2007) with title Dato' Seri Utama
; ASIAN MONARCHIES
to be completed
; EUROPEAN MONARCHIES
to be completed ...
Former Monarchies
to be completed ...
Republics
to be completed
See also
* Mirror page : List of honours of the Kedah Royal Family by country
